triples.name: E-commerce
triples.relevance: E-commerce platforms are the domain context where promotional product selection is applied and evaluated.

triples.name: Multiple-criteria decision analysis
triples.relevance: The research applies MCDM methods (SWARA and TOPSIS) to evaluate products based on multiple criteria.

triples.name: TOPSIS
triples.relevance: TOPSIS is the primary ranking method used to order products by preference based on similarity to ideal solutions.

triples.name: Weighted sum model
triples.relevance: The SWARA method applies weighted assignment principles to determine the importance of selection criteria.

triples.name: Ranking (information retrieval)
triples.relevance: The paper uses ranking methods to order and prioritize products for promotional selection.

triples.name: Consideration set
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a systematic method for evaluating and selecting products from a set of alternatives for promotion.
